title: The Size of Emotions
detail_text: <:th_ch0104/>....Phew, it’s done. This will do!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Hey, Dia. It’s time to prac-.... wait, what are you doing? Why did you sew that huuuuuge bag?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Ah, Kanan-san, is it that time already? I’ll join you shortly.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Nope, now I’m too curious about that bag. Will you use it to carry some tools for practice?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Uh? No, it’s a lucky charm bag.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Lucky charm...? You mean like those thingies they sell at temples?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Yes, exactly.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>I’ve never seen a charm that big before.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Of course you didn’t. It’s a special charm I made specifically for Ruby.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Wow, you can clearly see how big your love for her is~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Fufu~. Now I can put inside every lucky charm I got for Ruby.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>But aren’t you supposed to put the charm on yourself? Isn’t that a bit too big....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>That’s....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
